articles.title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier Episode 1: Marvel and MCU Easter Eggs - Den of Geek
articles.description: Marvel's The Falcon and the Winter Soldier episode 1 is now on Disney+. Here's all the MCU and Marvel Comics Easter eggs we could find!
